questions.question: There are ................................... things I don't like.
questions.description: Some is used in affirmative sentences.

questions.question: Is there ....................................... to help me?
questions.description: Any is used in questions and negatives and also after negative expressions like no one, hardly etc.

questions.question: I have .................................... questions to ask.
questions.description: A few can mean some. It denotes a small number.

questions.question: I would like ...................................... help.
questions.description: Some is used in affirmative sentences.

questions.question: Can ..................................... solve this problem?
questions.description: Any is used in questions and negatives and also after negative expressions like no one, hardly etc.

questions.question: She doesn't have .................................... friends.
questions.description: Any is used in questions and negatives and also after negative expressions like no one, hardly etc.

questions.question: I don't need .................................... help.
questions.description: Any is used in questions and negatives and also after negative expressions like no one, hardly etc.

questions.question: If she is in a bad mood, send her ..................................... flowers.
questions.description: Some is used in affirmative sentences.

questions.question: I couldn't find ................................... books on the subject.
questions.description: Any is used in questions and negatives and also after negative expressions like no one, hardly etc.

questions.question: I haven't got ...................................... cash on me.
questions.description: Any is used in questions and negatives and also after negative expressions like no one, hardly etc.

questions.question: No one has ....................................... idea how they managed to do it.
questions.description: Any is used in questions and negatives and also after negative expressions like no one, hardly etc.
